spec_data.Name: perl-Text-Roman
spec_data.Description:
This package supports both conventional Roman algorisms (which range from 1
to 3999) and Milhar Romans, a variation which uses a bar across the
algorism to indicate multiplication by 1000.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 05:23:02 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Conversion between Roman algorisms and Arabic numerals
